name: chapter_2
title: Introduction to Past Simple Tense
description: This chapter explains the past simple tense and how it is used to describe completed actions in the past.

questions.question: Which sentence is in the past simple tense?
Which of the following is correct in past simple tense?
When do we use the past simple tense?

options.C: To describe actions that will happen.
options.D: To describe completed actions in the past.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence in past simple tense.

options.D: They are playing football last weekend.
